page.title: 14Housing in Thurcroft
page.content: We wanted to find out about the Housing in Thurcroft.We did a survey, the first question we asked was "What kind of house do you live in".We found out that 58% are semi_detached.Also we found out that 22% of the houses are terraced and only 8% of the houses are detached. This means that there are not very many large detached houses in Thurcroft.The second question we asked was who owned the house. We found out that 44% of the houses are council and 35% of the houses are private and 21% of the houses are owned by the National Coal Board.The third question we asked was "How old is the house".We found out that only 4% of the houses in Thurcroft are less than 5 years old. This means that not many new houses have been built over the last 5 years.We found that 72% of the houses are over 20 years old.
